channel.title: Uhh what the fuck?
channel.description:
So i was updating my server and then all of the sudden this keeps happening never happend before.
So the error doesn't come up until i log in and log out and after the error i can't login anymore until i restart server
[code][15-7-10 10:24]: Game saved for player sohail [15-7-10 10:24]: java.lang.NullPointerException [15-7-10 10:24]: at server.model.players.Client.destruct(Client.java:235)
[15-7-10 10:24]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.removePlayer(Playe rHandler.java:336) [15-7-10 10:24]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:184) [15-7-10 10:24]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:152)[/code]

item.title: Uhh what the fuck?
item.dc:creator: @JavaGuru JavaGuru™
item.description:
@JavaGuru wrote:

It only happens when people are in duel arena i found out

Read full topic
